description: Liven up your lunch with this fresh vegan tofu bowl that's bursting with bold flavours and textures. Ready in just 20 minutes, it makes for a quick and easy lunch.
name: Speedy Summer Tofu Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide quinoa, cucumber, kaleslaw and tofu among bowls. Sprinkle with chilli, drizzle over extra tonkatsu sauce and serve with lime halves.
